title: Drawing, Design for Music Cabinet with Neo-Classical Ornament, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Music Cabinet with Neo-Classical Ornament
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, right of design: [illeg.] / inlay / two doors - open in center / sliding shelves- /  most approved / music cabinet [underlined] / drawer; below, center: Music Cabinet; at left and upper right of design, numerical notations indicating dimensions
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular body with front panel and lower shelf inlaid with neo-classical ornament; raised on 4 short, tapering legs.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Music Cabinet with Neo-Classical Ornament, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-224
